name: Myfamily
0:
”Alexa open my family”
”Alexa ask my family to say a family prayer”
”Alexa ask my family to say thank you to God”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my family
des:
This skill will enable Alexa say a short Thanksgiving or a Family Prayer. The skill could also say a short prayer or the Our father.

In Addition you could praise a family member by providing the relation and the name of the member name.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
